CmdLine: apt-get update -qq
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk wget expect git curl
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: useradd -u 1000 -M -s /bin/bash android
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: chown 1000 /opt
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /opt && wget -q https://dl.google.com/android/android-sdk_r24.4.1-linux.tgz -O android-sdk.tgz
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /opt && tar -xvzf android-sdk.tgz
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /opt && rm -f android-sdk.tgz
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo y | android update sdk --no-ui --all --filter platform-tools | grep 'package installed'
Commands.Name: run
